entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 03:37 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: N 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
